name: The Sisyphean Ninja Escape Sequence
description:
NOTE: Downloading is recommended if you want your highscore to be saved, or if the browser version has problems like poor performance or audio delay

---

My first real project in Godot, made within 72 hours as a submission to MashUp Game Jam 2. A NES-style endless runner where you play as a ninja with psionic powers and defeat your enemies using unconventional means (e.g. teleporting soldiers into their own bullets). Everything was made by me, with the exception of the font (by JapanYoshi) and the soldier sprite which I edited (by sfpt, made during the jam).

Features:

  • No direct attacks — use reflection and teleportation to defeat your enemies
  • Infinite, randomly generated stage that gets harder as you play
  • The game gradually gets faster, increasing your score multiplier as it goes. See how long you can survive!
  • Trve chiptvne soundtrack
  • Watch out for the red soldier guy
